entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JitDisasm not showing code bytes on Arm64 Mac #65638
  • HTTPS request delays 21 secs randomly in C# (HttpClient) (UWP) #65636
  • [API Proposal]: Add more string syntax type constants to StringSyntaxAttribute #65634
  • Incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers #65633
  • NRE in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventPipePayloadDecoder if both GC + Threading event keywords are enabled #65630
  • Slow "Mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release" #65626

Closed

  • RijndaelManaged Decryption is losing the last X characters on decryption. #65631
  • Typeforward System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe to SPC for netcore #45475
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Slightly relax file pattern for copying native components #65640
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix several casing mismatches causing failures on Unix #65639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Added support of atomic writes for custom value types #65635
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Faster vector == Vector128.Zero on arm64 #65632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup fp registers assignments from arm64 path #65629
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for a random test case orderer, for xunit tests #65628
    arch-wasm
  • NTLM: Enable MIC generation with the gss-ntlmssp provider #65627
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono][jit] Fix --break #65467
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Updated

  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: revise approach for x64 OSR epilogs #65609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Only register composite R2R native image code range once #65623
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix liveness for dead non-removable partial definitions #65618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Issue 62756 Some outer loop tests on Linux fail unless run as root #64619
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, community-contribution
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Cleanup platform-specific ifdefs #65624
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] ilc assertion failed when compiling ImageSharp #1851

PullRequests

Merged

  • Disable the EH Continuations feature fully #1855

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build and cache struct types in llvm.cpp #1854

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Different behaviour of --version-suffix switch #24036
  • `dotnet publish` ignores CPVM overrides for specific TFM #24033
  • I can't run the project because of the dotnet throw an error that wasn't my code #24032

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable artifacts post processing #24035
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Add artifacts post processing #24012
    Area-DotNet Test

Updated

  • Fix escaping function when argument ends with odd number of backslashes #23988
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Broken keyboard accelerator for "Rename symbol's file" when renaming #59677
  • IDE0052 False Positive when operator ??= is used #59675
  • Can't debug EditorFeatures layer #59673
  • Backslach in interpolated raw string literal #59670

Closed

  • `namedTySym.WithNullableAnnotation` isn't (apparently) working to remove annotations #59535

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not try to check for escapes in an interpolated raw string literal #59676
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix race condition in RequestTelemetryLogger #59669
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • SyntaxWrappingOptions #59604
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Additional tests for lambda attributes, explicit return type, and inferred delegate type #59634
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59668
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59667
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Use same format for Symbols in VerifyDiagnostics as MessageProvider #26581
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Add feature to fixup code when user transposes 'record' in a declaration #59652
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve json error message in particular case #59650
    Area-IDE
  • Lightup embedded languages inside collections marked with StringSyntax #59648
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Global ide analyzer options #59657
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix 'unnecessary assigment' false posititive for out argument (#58564) #59625
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • window.onresize event #40325

Closed

  • I've added `AddNewtonsoftJson` but seems still use `System.Text.Json` #40324
  • Model validation with Minimal API #39063
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Added reference to the Deveel's MongoDB #40323
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Add EndpointMetadataCollection.GetRequiredMetadata #39921 #40321
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Annotate SqlServer and Redis caches for nullability #40319
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Add a switch to defer rendering of components in ComponentTagHelper #40316
    area-blazor
  • Add aspnet-build ownership of Version files #40309
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • New TryParseModelBinder #40233
    area-mvc
  • Only enable trailers/reset/goaway on OSs that support them #40310
    area-runtime
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cascade deletion of related records are dangerous, why is it the default? #27479
  • Batch delete and insert #27478
  • SQL Server: reduce default minimum batch size to 1 #27477

PullRequests

Merged
